explanation: Funds are required to support continued implementation and expansion of the Sexual Assault Special Victims’ Counsel Program and Special Victims Investigation and Prosecution Capability, consistent with the section 8059 of division C of Public Law 117-103, the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2022, to provide legal assistance to eligible victims of an alleged sex-related offense to enhance investigations and prosecutions of allegations of child abuse, serious domestic or sexual offenses and to provide support for such victims. This is a congressional special interest item. These are base budget
